Wishlist

Polycademy has a repository of ideas and projects that either haven't been made, or has been made but can be improved. This is where you describe your ideas that you want others to make or make with you! They don't all have to be monetisable, they just have to be interesting!

Web Apps

Git Pocket

Git Pocket is manages your starred repositories on Git into stacks. Stacks are shareable socially and can integrate into package managers so you can download your “stack” for different purposes.
